settings.title: Return and Refunds Policy
settings.description:
Returns and Refunds

1. Returns
a. We want you to be satisfied with your purchase. If you are not completely happy with your order, please contact our customer support team within 30 days of receiving your product.

2. Eligibility
a. To be eligible for a return, your item must be in the same condition as when you received it, unused, and in its original packaging.

3. Refunds
a. Once your return is received and inspected, we will send you an email to notify you of the approval or rejection of your refund.
b. If approved, your refund will be processed, and a credit will be applied to your original method of payment.

4. Exchanges
a. We only replace items if they are defective or damaged. If you need to exchange a product for the same item, please contact us.

5. Shipping Costs
a. Shipping costs for returning items are your responsibility unless the product received is defective or damaged.

6. Contact Information
For returns and refunds inquiries, please contact us at support@naturelypure.com.
